content.query:
-- CREATE EXTERNAL TABLES AS SELECT (CETAS)
-- How many individuals are related to each family?

USE woca_ldw
GO 

IF OBJECT_ID('gold.FamilyRelationshipCount') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.FamilyRelationshipCount
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.FamilyRelationshipCount
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = woca_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'gold/FamilyRelationshipCount',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
    fm.family_relationship,
    COUNT(1) AS Counts
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.Family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
WHERE fm.family_relationship IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY fm.family_relationship
ORDER BY Counts DESC;
